Gazdík has not only defined himself against Andrey Babiš's ANO party for a long time, in their first joint press conference Dědek, who publicly praises Babiš, stated: "My goal is for the ANO movement, the Starostové movement, to gains 20 percent in the upcoming elections."
He has the second-highest approval rating of the nation's 50 governors.
He'd survived for so long, his friends and colleagues assumed he'd always be there.
